entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Data & Analytics] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 15, 20:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.
For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [US-WEST-OR-1/US-EAST-VA-1/BHS5/WAW1/GRA9][Identity, Security & Operations] - Secret Management Service
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 28, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Aug 21, 15:58 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Secret Management Service.

Start time: 28/08/2025 12:00 UTC
End time: 28/08/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact: During this maintenance window, you may encounter the following impacts on US, BHS, WAW, GRA on a short period of time :

You may not be able to perform Administration tasks on Load Balancer service (creation, deletion, etc.)
You may not be able to perform Administration tasks on Encrypted Volumes (creation, deletion, etc.)
Service of already deployed will not be affected, from end-user perspective

Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Secret Management Service.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.content:
Aug 25, 05:16 UTC

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

Thank you for your understanding

Aug 25, 02:56 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Aug 25, 02:49 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our compute - Instance offering in the specified regions.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 25/08/2025 02:16 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some instances are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their instances located in the specified regions.
Root Cause : This incident is due to an unexpected infrastructure malfunction.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA9/GRA11][Data & Analytics] - Data Platform incident notification
entry.content:
Aug 21, 15:36 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Data Platform offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 21/08/2025 11:31 UTC
End time : 21/08/2025 15:10 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by operation on this maintenance :
https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/595w2krs75d4

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Aug 21, 12:17 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Data Platform offer in the GRA9/GRA11 regions.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 21/08/2025 11:31 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : User interface platform outage.
Customers Impact : All services linked to our backend RabbitMQ are currently down. As a result, scheduled jobs are not running and the platform is unavailable.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by operation on this maintenance: https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/595w2krs75d4
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
